alert.note: Alert for Canadian; Cleveland; Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 6:26AM CDT until June 10 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Oklahoma County in central Oklahoma... Northwestern Cleveland County in central Oklahoma... East central Canadian County in central Oklahoma... * Until 700 AM CDT. * At 625 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over western Oklahoma City, or near The Fairgrounds, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Oklahoma City, Moore, Midwest City, Del City, Yukon, Bethany, Mustang, Warr Acres, The Village, Spencer, Nichols Hills, Valley Brook, Tinker Air Force Base, Forest Park, Woodlawn Park, Lake Aluma, and Smith Village. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
